# Alexandra Barbu - Psiholog Clinician

> Psihoterapie individuala si de cuplu in Bucuresti. Alexandra Barbu ofera servicii profesionale de psihologie clinica pentru adulti.

## About the Author

Alexandra Barbu - Psiholog Clinician
Psiholog clinician cu peste 15 ani de experienta in psihoterapie individuala si de cuplu.

## Site Structure

This website is organized into the following main sections:

- [Acasa](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/): Homepage
- [Despre Mine](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/despre-mine/): About the therapist
- [Servicii](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/servicii/): Therapy services
- [Resurse](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/resurse/): Articles and resources
- [Contact](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/contact/): Contact information

## Services

- [Terapie Individuala](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/servicii/terapie-individuala/): Individual psychotherapy for adults
- [Terapie de Cuplu](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/servicii/terapie-de-cuplu/): Couples therapy
- [Consiliere Psihologica](https://alexandrabarbu.ro/servicii/consiliere-psihologica/): Psychological counseling

## Key Topics Covered

- Anxiety disorders and management
- Depression treatment
- Couples therapy and relationship issues
- Stress management
- Panic attacks
- Self-esteem and personal development
- Grief and loss counseling

## Contact Information

- Location: Bucuresti, Romania
- Website: https://alexandrabarbu.ro
- Appointment booking: https://alexandrabarbu.ro/contact/

This site is available in:
- Romanian (ro) - primary
